items.name: Anusha R.
items.before: Used WhatsApp and YouTube only; no confidence with AI tools.
items.after: Created daily prompt routines, family budgeting assistant, and simple document drafting workflow.
items.quote: Mentor support made AI feel practical and not intimidating.

items.name: Rahul S.
items.before: Manual content posting and inconsistent customer follow-ups.
items.after: Built weekly content calendar, lead follow-up prompts, and response templates for enquiries.
items.quote: The cohort format kept me accountable and I implemented during the course itself.

items.name: Kiran P.
items.before: Knew coding, but not how to apply AI tools for developer productivity and portfolio proof.
items.after: Completed portfolio project, code-review prompts, and interview-ready documentation.
items.quote: I liked that every deliverable had mentor feedback instead of just lectures.

items.name: Priyanka M.
items.before: Spent hours rewriting campaign copy and follow-up emails.
items.after: Built reusable campaign prompt library and approval-ready draft workflow.
items.quote: This was practical coaching, not generic AI theory.

items.name: Mahesh T.
items.before: Unsure where to start with AI and overwhelmed by tool choices.
items.after: Created learning plan, personal productivity toolkit, and starter project outputs.
items.quote: The structure and feedback made me take consistent action.
